name: greenpeace/planet4-content-default
description: Scripts that control the default content of the default planet4 installation

scripts.core:initial-content-11: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Social' Twitter http://twitter.com --position=1 --classes='fa fa-twitter'
scripts.core:initial-content-12: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Social' Facebook http://facebook.com --position=2 --classes='fa fa-facebook-official'
scripts.core:initial-content-13: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Social' Youtube http://youtube.com --position=3 --classes='fa fa-youtube-play'
scripts.core:initial-content-14: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Social' Instagram http://instagram.com --position=4 --classes='fa fa-instagram'
scripts.core:initial-content-16: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Primary' NEWS --position=1
scripts.core:initial-content-17: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Primary' ABOUT --position=2
scripts.core:initial-content-18: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Primary' FAQ --position=3
scripts.core:initial-content-19: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Primary' PRESS --position=4
scripts.core:initial-content-20: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Primary' TERMS --position=5
scripts.core:initial-content-22: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Secondary' PRIVACY --position=1
scripts.core:initial-content-23: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Secondary' CODE OF CONDUCT --position=2
scripts.core:initial-content-24: wp menu item add-custom 'Footer Secondary' JOBS --position=3
